description: Unique identifier for each row, based on camera, date to, and image_n (left padded to 5 digits)
Date image was captured (from image metadata)
Time image was captured (from image metadata)
Type of image
field_format: Blank, Animal, Maintenance (Start, Setup, Pickup, End), Corrupt, Needs ID

description: Identification of first species in image, as a binomial (Genus species)
field_format: See table of binomial values (32 options)

description: Count of first species in an image
field_format: Values greater than or equal to 0

description: Notes or comments about the image
example: View blocked by grass; fox carrying prey

description: Name of the person who identified the contents of the image
Flag for an image that needs additional review (i.e., a yellow highlight)
Flag for an image that is good (i.e., a blue highlight)
Flag for an image with an error (timestamp, knocked down, obstructed view, camera problem)
Name of the person who QC'd the contents of the image
Certainty about image identification
field_format: Absolutely sure, Pretty sure, or Not sure (See table of certainty values for details)

description: Identification of second species in image, as a binomial
field_format: See table of binomial values (32 options)

description: Count of second species in an image
field_format: Values greater than or equal to 0

description: Identification of third species in image, as a binomial
field_format: See table of binomial values (32 options)

description: Count of third species in an image
field_format: Values greater than or equal to 0

description: Unique identifier for each deployment
field_format: Seventeen character sequence of "site_camera_end date" using the pattern "X_X#_YYMMDD_#####"

description: Image number
Full file path for the image file
field_format: Full image file path, including .JPG suffix

description: Date and time image was captured in UTC format (from image metadata)
